definition: the Book of History, one of the Five Classics of Confucianism 五經|五经[Wu3 jing1], a compendium of documents which make up the oldest extant texts of Chinese history, from legendary times down to the time of Confucius, also known as 尚書經|尚书经[Shang4 shu1 jing1], 尚書|尚书[Shang4 shu1], 書|书[Shu1]
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
book/letter/document/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]/to write
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
surname Jing
Book of History/a compendium of documents in various styles, making up the oldest extant texts of Chinese history, from legendary times down to the times of Confucius

sentences.english: Once the mediation agreement is signed and exchanged by both parties, it shall become legally binding.
sentences.chinese: 調解書經雙方當事人簽收後，即具有法律效力。

sentences.english: The statement of mediation shall take legal effect after acknowledgement by both parties.
sentences.chinese: 調解書經雙方當事人簽收後，發生法律效力。

sentences.english: A conciliation statement shall have legal effect once signed and accepted by the parties.
sentences.chinese: 調解書經雙方當事人簽收後，即發生法律效力。

sentences.english: The book proves useful to many students.
sentences.chinese: 這本書經證明對許多學生有用。

sentences.english: The statement of mediation shall carry legal effect after acknowledgement.
sentences.chinese: 調解書經雙方當事人簽收後，發生法律效力。

sentences.english: The mediation paper shall be legally effective after both parties sign the receipt thereof.
sentences.chinese: 調解書經雙方當事人簽收後，即發生法律效力。

sentences.english: Authenticated and legalized Certificate of Incorporations of foreign investor, original, 2 copies.
sentences.chinese: 公司註冊證書經中國駐該國領事館認證，原件，2份。

sentences.english: A formal membership card shall be issued to applicant once the club has approved the application.
sentences.chinese: 申請書經本部審批後，即向申請人發出會員卡。

sentences.english: Once it is receipted by the two parties concerned , the conciliation statement shall become legally effective.
sentences.chinese: 調解書經雙方當事人簽收後，即具有法律效力。

sentences.english: A mediation record shall take effect after being signed by both parties.
sentences.chinese: 調解書經雙方當事人簽收後，發生法律效力。

Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479), with capital at Nanjing
letter/also written 書札|书札
